column1: #Text=Chef says : " I call it the kalenutsco .
#Text=Please sit down , I want to talk to you .
#Text=Look , I 'm just not really comfortable talking about these kinds of things , and ... well , I wanted to say that I 'm sorry about the other night .
#Text=" Lin says : " Your mother and I have a complicated relationship and ... " Opal says : " It 's probably difficult for you to be here .
#Text=" Lin says : " You 're a smart young woman , and an excellent airbender .
#Text=I think it would be a wonderful opportunity to train with the other airbenders at the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=" Opal says : " There 's a part of me that wants to go , but ... I do n't want to upset my mom .
#Text=" Lin says : " When I was younger , all I wanted to do was please my mother .
#Text=I became a police chief because I thought it would make her happy ... but it did n't .
#Text=You need to make your decisions based on what you want .
#Text=Do n't make the same mistakes as I did .
